article:
Events and trends
* 1627 BCâBeginning of a period of cooling of the world climate lasting several
  years, recorded in tree-rings all over the world. It might have
  been caused by the Minoan eruption of Thera which according to the
  Parian Chronicle occurred in 1627, or the Avellino eruption of Mount
  Vesuvius.
* 1625 BCâSamsu-Ditana becomes King of Babylon (middle chronology).
* 1621 BCâLullaia becomes the King of Assyria.
* 1620 BCâMursili I becomes King of the Hittite Empire (middle chronology).
